text: "The Way You Make Me Feel" is a song by American singer Michael Jackson. It was the third single from Jackson's seventh album Bad (1987). It was produced by Quincy Jones. Like the two singles before it, it reached number 1 in the Billboard Hot 100. It was also number 1 in Spain. He performed the song at the 1988 Grammy Awards. After Jackson died in 2009 the song entered the charts again. ==Music video== In the video Jackson follows a girl called Tatiana Thumbtzen around and sings "The Way You Make Me Feel". La Toya Jackson appears as one of the girl's friends. ==Cover versions== *In February 2010, Whitney Houston performed "The Way You Make Me Feel" at her I Look to You Tour. ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:R&B; songs
title: The Way You Make Me Feel
